column1: I’m looking forward to this important #BackToSchool2020  zoom forum for parents and students on Covid-19 tomorrow night at 7pm with Dr. @panagis21 from @hopkinsmedicine and my partners in the community @JSandersNYC @SenJoeAddabbo @Stacey23AD @DRichards13 & @KhaleelAnderson https://t.co/tq69q2xLQl

To prevent the community spread of COVID-19 all registered voters may apply for an Absentee Ballot to vote in the upcoming June 23 2020 elections.  Board of Elections: https://t.co/yMUV9SPGGY Call: 1-866-VOTE-NYC E-mail: AbsenteeJune2020@boe.nyc

Mark ‘Temporary Illness’ on the form as the reason you are requesting the ballot - this definition has been temporarily expanded to include both those affected by COVID-19 and/or the potential of contracting the virus. #VoteFromHome
